title: fvDialog
description: To create full featured dialog element (alert, confirm, custom messages) use this component.

prop.name: overlay
prop.description: Does dialog has an overlay behind?

prop.name: animation
prop.description: A CSS class to handle opening and closing animation (will directly set to Vue.js transition name)

event.name: input
event.description: Fired when component request to change value (close and open request by dialog).

class.name: .not-center
class.description: Remove vertically and horizontally position styles.

note: fvDialog should atleast one fvMain parent with parent prop.
fvDialog uses translate(-50%, -50%); left: 50%; top: 50%; way to put itself vertically and horizontaly on center. If you use .not-center class or custom animation, dont remember to handle it.
